segments.text: Let's get the table wares we need first , And then stand in the line .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Let's stand in the line now .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It smells good . Look at these . They make my mouth watering .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: It will be our turn soon .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Tell the waiter what you want when it's your turn .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: OK . I'll have many cream cakes today .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I don't like them . I think they are too icky .
segments.speaker: S2
